name: Cerberus Unleashed!
description:
Note: I somehow mixed up both the options in the level select screen. If you don't want to miss out on the story, then check the box labeled "Skip Story" (I know, it's weird, but I'll patch it when I get the chance!) Same thing for tutorials.

This game is abandonware, but it's actually playable from start to end! The codebase is complete spaghetti, and the project is simply too big for me to finish

Please let me know what you think; maybe one day I'll take another crack at making this game!

---Instructions---

Goal is to reach checkered square.

WASD (or left click adjacent square) to move.

Hold shift and press WASD (or right click adjacent square) to perform ability.

Jack can push single blocks real far. Hold shift while pushing a block to activate that ability.

Laguna can pull blocks. Hold shift and move in the direction you want to pull.

Kahuna fires fireballs which either push or disintegrate blocks. Hold shift and press the direction you want to fire.

Cerberus can jump over walls, pits, spikes, and most blocks (except for red spikes). Hold shift and hit the move keys to create a jump path. Cerberus can jump as far as they wish!

Use keys 123 (or click characters directly) to switch character.

Left Control to merge.

U to undo

R to reset.
